name: Shotgun Kids Front Mounted Bike Seat - Youths
description: Get out and hit the trails with your little ripper. Shotgun Kids has created a beautifully simple frame mounted seat that allows you to share your love of riding trails with the next generation. The padded seat to the grippy foot pegs give your tiny passenger a secure base to grab your handlebars and enjoy the ride. Bundled with all the tools you need, installation is easy. And, once your have fit the MTB frame seat to your bike, removal and remounting are quick, easy and tool-free.Designed for kids from 2-5 years old and up to 22kg (48lb).Comfortable, padded seat is easy to adjust.Grippy foot pegs have adjustable straps to prevent slippage.Frame contact points are molded rubber, keeping your alloy or carbon frame safe.Adjustable width and angle let this seat fit most mountain bike frames (not designed for hybrid, road or e-bike frames).Quick release fitting makes mounting and removal easy.Simple installation, and the 3 tools you will need to install are included.
